title: Ligay Ngern Roi
resume: The Story of a Thai fold hero, but few people have a folk hero these days. This drama takes place in a time when money was scarce ..and when the culture is about to be swallowed by globalization. They still stand by their love and pride in the culture of Thailand! Because that is what their parents and grandparents did.
